item.title: Mexican Sessions album download - preview *
item.itunes:subtitle: Featuring: Blanquito Man & Fragment Crew (NYC), Control Machete & Sistema Local (Mexico), Romanowski, Switchstance Records (Germany). Loved by KCRW DJs. This is our simple, sensational sound...
item.itunes:author: Up, Bustle and Out - www.upbustleandout.co.uk
item.description: Our 8th Album Taking the Soundsystem further, working with some of the greatest Hip Hop and Cumbia producers on the planet. If you have seen the films `Amores Perros`, `Volveras` or `Raising Victor Vargas` & heard `Control Machete` or `Cypress Hill` - then this is a Latin Street Production ahead of its time that will reach you.
item.itunes:summary: Our 8th Album Taking the Soundsystem further, working with some of the greatest Hip Hop and Cumbia producers on the planet. If you have seen the films `Amores Perros`, `Volveras` or `Raising Victor Vargas` & heard `Control Machete` or `Cypress Hill` - then this is a Latin Street Production ahead of its time that will reach you.
item.itunes:keywords: mexico, cumbia, latin, beats, dub, remix

item.title: Istanbul`s Secrets album download - preview *
item.itunes:subtitle: Featured vocalist is Turkey`s celebrated film actress-singer, Sevval Sam. Portishead`s double bass player Jim Barr brings a powerful and haunting depth. Rob Garza of Thievery Corporation opens the album with vocals and floating sitar melodies.
item.itunes:author: Up, Bustle and Out - www.upbustleandout.co.uk
item.description: The 10th album from Up, Bustle and Out, featuring Sevval Sam. Istanbul`s Secrets is a wonderful achievement, a world music album like no other: truly global, experimental, original, cultured and fun.
item.itunes:summary: The 10th album from Up, Bustle and Out, featuring Sevval Sam. Istanbul`s Secrets is a wonderful achievement, a world music album like no other: truly global, experimental, original, cultured and fun.
item.itunes:keywords: world, istanbul, turkey, album, cd, downbeat, rhythm, dub, effects

item.title: Urban Evacuation album download - preview *
item.itunes:subtitle: Sessions involved Latin percussionists, Double Bass by Jim Barr (Portishead Band, UK), Jamaican DJ Youth, Premier Jazz blowers like Andy Sheppard & Andy Hague, Portuguese & Angolan Soul Singers, Dubby Indian beats by Nitin Sawhney, & Dub Poets:
item.itunes:author: Up, Bustle and Out - www.upbustleandout.co.uk
item.description: Our 6th Album Focusing on the movement from Jamaican Dub producers like King Tubby to modern, cool UK urban grooves. Studio sessions were originally pressed in Kingston, Jamaica as limited 7" singles
item.itunes:summary: Our 6th Album Focusing on the movement from Jamaican Dub producers like King Tubby to modern, cool UK urban grooves. Studio sessions were originally pressed in Kingston, Jamaica as limited 7" singles

item.title: The Pre-Ninja Series album download - preview *
item.itunes:subtitle: For the first time ever, we are compiling our earliest vinyl recordings and it`s time to offer them to the digital market. Some of UB&O were just 18 years old at the time of recording and the Sessions found here are rare and were never released on albu
item.itunes:author: Up, Bustle and Out - www.upbustleandout.co.uk
item.description: Always sharing a global vision, UB&O`s first recording was in French with Flutes, sax, keyboards, tons of experimental percussion, Spanish guitars & vocals - ALL flavour this portrait of the Pre-Ninja Tune Days...
item.itunes:summary: Always sharing a global vision, UB&O`s first recording was in French with Flutes, sax, keyboards, tons of experimental percussion, Spanish guitars & vocals - ALL flavour this portrait of the Pre-Ninja Tune Days...
item.itunes:keywords: flute, sax, keyboards, percussion, experimental, spanish, guitar, vocal

item.title: Istanbul`s Secrets Air Mixes preview
item.itunes:subtitle: Featuring unheard instrumentals and effects re-edited from the original vocal versions
item.itunes:author: Up, Bustle and Out - www.upbustleandout.co.uk
item.description: Unique ambient dub mixes of our acclaimed Istanbul`s Secrets album. Fantastical, effect-laden re-interpretations of songs with Sevval Sam and Cuffy`s Flamenco Guitar.

item.title: Remixes preview
item.itunes:subtitle: Remix collaborations, mixdowns, re-edits and re-recordings of bands, vocalists and tracks. UB&O studio magic brings great songs to life.

item.description: Our track record includes succesful remixes for Josh One, Dragon Ash (Japan), Thievery Corporation, Silent Poets (Japan), Nitin Sawhney and many others
